item.title: Western Asset Mortgage Capital Corp 10-K
item.description: Western Asset Mortgage Capital Corp, which is in the Real Estate Investment Trusts [6798] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 08, 2022 had 50121 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: interest - 726 instances loans - 564 instances 31 - 546 instances december - 540 instances value - 501 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
